Key Match Events: Larry Nance Jr. scored 14 points against his former team
Pre-Game Insights: Zion Williamson was scratched from the lineup with right hamstring tightness
Brandon Ingram was the club’s only usual starter in uniform
Post-Match Reflections: Pelicans star forward Zion Williamson was scratched from the lineup with right hamstring tightness shortly before the game
Ingram scored 32, but it wasn’t enough to overcome a Hawks squad with six players with at least 11 points
Miscellaneous Highlights: Atlanta Hawks forward Jalen Johnson (1) dunks against New Orleans Pelicans forward Jamal Cain (8) during the second half of an NBA basketball game
